keyEvents.title: Sanji and Usopp Infiltrate the Ark
keyEvents.description: Sanji and Usopp board the flying ship using rope-shooting gadgets, observing its elaborate automated machinery keeping it airborne.
keyEvents.significance: First time the interior workings of the Ark Maxim are explored in detail, revealing its technological sophistication.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Sacrifice on the Deck
keyEvents.description: On the deck of the Ark Maxim, Sanji takes Enel's devastating God's Judgment attack to save Usopp and Nami.
keyEvents.significance: The Ark Maxim serves as the stage for one of the most heroic moments in the Skypiea arc.

keyEvents.title: Ark Maxim Systems Sabotaged
keyEvents.description: The ship's systems begin malfunctioning due to Sanji's sabotage - black clouds stop emitting from chimneys and electrical connections become unstable.
keyEvents.significance: Sanji's sabotage damages Enel's plan to destroy Skypiea and represents a significant setback for the antagonist.

description: The Ark Maxim is Enel's massive flying ship, a technological marvel powered by his Goro Goro no Mi electricity. The ship features elaborate automated machinery and is designed to fly to the moon. It plays a central role in Enel's plan to destroy Skypiea.
features: Automated flight systems powered by electricity

keyEvents.title: Sanji and Usopp Prepare to Ascend
keyEvents.description: Sanji and Usopp wake up in Upper Yard and prepare to climb to the Ark Maxim floating above them.
keyEvents.significance: Upper Yard serves as the starting point for the rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Dark Storm Clouds Gather Over Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: Massive dark storm clouds gather above Upper Yard as part of Enel's destructive plan, creating an ominous atmosphere.
keyEvents.significance: The gathering clouds foreshadow Enel's plan to destroy the entire island and all of Skypiea.

description: Upper Yard is the sacred land at the center of Skypiea, originally part of Jaya that was launched into the sky 400 years ago. It's the site of the ancient city of Shandora and the focus of Enel's survival game.

keyEvents.title: Robin Moves the Wounded in Shandora
keyEvents.description: Robin uses her Devil Fruit powers to carry injured warriors including Zoro and Wyper through the ruins of Shandora near Giant Jack.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the aftermath of the battles and Robin's role in protecting the fallen.

description: The ancient ruins of the golden city of Shandora, located in Upper Yard. It was once a prosperous civilization that protected important historical secrets.
